intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the creation of a JDBC datasource.

item.title: Show the repository view
item.description: Select Window > Show View > Other... at the top of Eclipse. In Jaspersoft Studio folder, select Repository and do OK. This will show the repository view.

item.title: Launch the JDBC datasource editor
item.description: In the repository view, go to Datasources > JDBC Datasources. Right-click on JDBC Datasources and do Create... . This will launch the JDBC datasource editor.
